SwitchPreference.android:title: Home feed
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The typical feed everyone gets when opening the app. Does not include stories.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Story strip
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The strip where all stories are contained at the top of the app. Does not disable stories in general.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Reel feed
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The feed where short videos / reels are played

SwitchPreference.android:title: Explore feed
SwitchPreference.android:summary: The explore feed under the search bar when clicking at the search icon.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Followed feed
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disables normal Instagram algorithm. Only content of followed accounts.

Preference.android:summary: This app is not related to Instagram or Meta. NoReel only provides a Web browser visiting www.instagram.com with browser modifications such as removing the Reel icon UI component. NoReel is not intended to block ads or to prevent revenue. NoReel does not interfere Instagram data usage. NoReel's data policy applies as for visiting www.instagram.com.
